title: Hot Spots
description: Jane Baker smokes a lot of weed.Some people blame the drugs for her conviction that the supernatural exists, but she’s been obsessed with ghosts since she was three. When she’s broke and needs to make rent, the answer seems simple: start a ghost hunting vlog and become an internet celebrity.At first, the “Hot Spots” channel comes across nothing spookier than a couple of creaky doors and the odd eerie moan until she and her friends discover a murder.Jane has it made if she can prove a ghost was responsible. But if her half baked murder investigation goes awry, they’ll end up dead, arrested, or worse.
author: Gwendoline Nelson
